author: Gab Hernandez
description:
A brand new Warhammer Grand Cathay box set is set to go on sale this coming Saturday, June 22.  Governed by the divine providence of dragons,  the Grand Cathay combines discipline, magic, and gunpowder to create a formidable fighting force. One could argue that the Empire of Grand Cathay in Warhammer: The Old World is a better foil to Warhammer 40k’s Imperium. Certainly more so than Karl Franz’s “empire” of feudal states. After all, what nations feature feuding demigod children led by an aloof God-Emperor but Cathay and the Imperium?

Continue reading Warhammer The Old World teases a Grand Cathay box set for preorder this week
MORE FROM WARGAMER: The best tabletop RPGs,
title: Warhammer The Old World teases a Grand Cathay box set for preorder this week

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
DnD adventures are filled with chaotic moments that make your party wonder just how they survived. But every GM knows that those encounters aren’t so easily designed. That’s where the Monsters, Traps, and DM Tricks bundle comes in. With over 60 books, the bundle is dedicated to making adventures the frantic thrill rides they deserve to be - all at a generous 95% off!

Continue reading Bamboozle your DnD players with 800 bucks worth of traps in one $40 book bundle
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Bamboozle your DnD players with 800 bucks worth of traps in one $40 book bundle

author: Chloe Ward
description:
If you love feisty felines (not to be confused with elephants) and strategy games, then you’re in for a treat. The Build Your Own Tabletop and Deck Builder Bundle includes cat strategy games; Isle of Cats and Quilts and Cats of Calico, along with a selection of 16 other digital adaptations of popular board games.

Continue reading Get The Isle of Cats and other cosy digital board games at more than 50% off

title: Get The Isle of Cats and other cosy digital board games at more than 50% off

author: Timothy Linward
description:
With a fresh range of starter sets launching for Star Wars Legion this summer and fall, we asked Will Shick, the Creative and Development VP at Atomic Mass Games (AMG), and Will Pagani, Game Development Director, to find out what each of the packs offer to new players. Today, lets examine what the Galactic Empire starter set has to offer:

title: Star Wars Legion's lead designers delve into the Galactic Empire starter set
